it.cnr.isti.thematrix.configuration.mapping

Class Dataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.thematrix.configuration.mapping.Dataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICheckable

    public class Dataset
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICheckable
    Class for the mapping schema of a IAD dataset, handles the dataset XML tag. This class interfaces with XML parsing via annotations. FIXME the whole class tries to give the impression of a Hash table for mappings, while the Collection is actually more useful (VERY bad choice in the original translation algorithm in ValueRemapper!)

      • getLIADAttributes

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getLIADAttributes(java.lang.String LIADTable,
                                                       java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> iadAttributes)
        Gets the LIAD column names belonging to a LIAD table used to map the specified set of IAD attributes. Will only return the LIAD columns which are actually needed to generate the SQL queries, not taking into account any VoidMapping.
        Parameters:
        LIADTable - the LIAD table
        iadAttributes - The set of IAD attributes
        Returns:
        A Collection.

      • getVoidAttributes

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getVoidAttributes()
        Gets within this IAD dataset the IAD attribute names that are completely missing in mapped LIAD tables, and are substituted with voidMappings. FIXME note the inconsistency with previous method, here IAD attributes are returned.
        Parameters:
        iadAttributes - The set of IAD attributes
        Returns:
        A Collection.

      • getAllIADAttributesOrdered

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getAllIADAttributesOrdered(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> liadAttributeNames)
                                                                  throws SyntaxErrorInMappingException
        Translate each LIAD attribute name into the equivalent IAD name, in the order of the LIAD list argument. Gets the IAD attributes corresponding to a set of LIAD attributes.
